s.text: Who will be our next cartoon old-timer, and what particular geriatric qualities will he or she embody?
The liquid paper is to fix the signs of protesters, while the diapers and Kevlar are just precautionary."

"Three things you will need if you are a 110-year-old black writer intent on composing your autobiography on a manual typewriter in an outdoor location where New York police officers may happen to walk by."

"Three things you will need if you are a 110-year-old black writer intent on composing your autobiography on a manual typewriter in an outdoor location where New York police officers may happen to walk by."
But the fact is neither man can live forever.
Actual event at Monday night's Drama League benefit: Mary Tyler Moore, Diane Sawyer, Katie Couric, and Liz Smith dance in a number from Cabaret .
